description: This file defines a React Native screen component for creating and editing notes within a note-taking application. It manages user input for note title and content, handles loading existing note data when editing, and provides save/cancel functionality with appropriate UI styling.

methods.name: NoteEditorScreen
methods.description: Main React functional component for the note editor screen, managing state, effects, and UI.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Handles saving the note when the user presses the save button, either creating a new note or updating an existing one.

calls: Alert.alert('Empty note', 'Please add a title or content.')
